name: VR_PlayRoom
description: Play a game with your friends to reach the highest score.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 , Windows10 Processor: I5-5600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 750Ti DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7 , Windows10 Processor: I7-4790K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
